3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located a short walk to Alta Plaza Park, and the many shops and restaurants on Sacramento and Fillmore St, this beautifully remodeled home combines the character and charm of the Victorian era with the apex of design, construction and convenience of today. This 4 bed, 4.5 bath home is warm and inviting from the moment one enters. With high ceilings that provide great volume throughout the house, the scale of the home is felt in every room. Social rooms lead seamlessly to the open chef's kitchen and family room. Both the dining room and kitchen open to the deck and a landscaped garden. A beautiful Victorian era staircase leads to the bedroom level which benefits from 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. The primary suite was recently remodeled and showcases pretty outlooks, large closets and an incredible primary bathroom with mosaic tiles, soaking tub, steam shower. Two additional large bedrooms with great light are just down the hall, one having an ensuite bathroom and the other having its bathroom steps away. The home features a legal 2nd unit on the lowest level with private entrance, perfect family or for an au pair. Hardwood floors , AC, custom stained glass windows, Solar Panels, Sonos, Lutron light system are some of the many features that make this home so exceptional.
Confidential Remarks: Easy to show by appointment Please email team@cityrealestatesf.com to show or for disclosures. Home has a vacant legal in-law unit on lowest level. 2 parking: one in the garage and one in the driveway.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This charming, updated, two-level condominium in Presidio Heights features a lovely deeded garden and deeded 2 car (s/s) garage (located on Sacramento street side of property) for this unit only. One of 2 condominiums, 1849 Lyon lives like a single family home, with its own entrance and garage. The main level features a large living room, updated kitchen which opens to a formal dining space. Primary bedroom with en suite full bath which opens to garden. A second bedroom and full bath complete this level. The lower level offers flexible use of rooms with 2 rooms, one of which is currently used as a bedroom and the other a larger room with en suite full bath (currently used as a family room). The exclusive use garden, 2 car door garage, laundry room, and substantial storage complete this very special offering. Walk to Sacramento Street restaurants & boutiques, Laurel Village, Presidio trails and Fillmore shopping district.
Confidential Remarks: On hold for a few days over Christmas but happy to show. PLEASE PARK On Sacramento side of property .Double driveway and garage on Sacramento belong this address. DO BOT BLOCK the garage on Lyon- this belongs to 1847 owners.Website: www.1849lyon.com

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: On a prized street near the City's most sought-after private schools, this lovely home is awash in light from its expansive windows and skylights. Ideally-configured for entertaining, the main level has a spacious open floor plan and an expansive kitchen appointed with stainless steel appliances, breakfast bar and abundant cabinetry. The bright living and dining areas boast soaring ceilings, convenient built-ins and one of the home's two fireplaces. The main level is completed by a generous primary bedroom with ample closet space, a full bath and lovely outlooks to the well-tended garden. The lower level offers a bright bedroom that opens onto the tranquil, beautifully-landscaped garden. A study/library with cozy fireplace offers a private retreat that may have potential to be converted to a third bedroom or media room. The home has an enviable mix of period details and thoughtful updates for today's modern living including solar panels and a four-zone heating and cooling system that offers comfort year-round. This lovely home is completed by a garage with internal access and electric vehicle charger. The driveway offers additional parking space for some vehicles. Very convenient to the shops and restaurants on Union and Fillmore Streets, Alta Plaza and the Presidio!
Confidential Remarks: Offers will be reviewed at 10:00 a.m. on Wednesday, March 6. This is a trust sale with no court confirmation required. Buyer to pay transfer tax and cost of compliance with San Francisco Energy and Water Conservation ordinances. Offers should be submitted on the San Francisco Purchase Agreement (Rev. 12/23).

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: An incredibly charming, 3-story remodeled Victorian in one of San Francisco's desirable neighborhoods. The main level offers gracious public rooms, family room, eat-in kitchen, 2 bedrooms, full bathroom with laundry, and convenient outdoor space. The living room features soaring bay windows & wonderful light. The connected formal dining room w/ fireplace is centered & flows seamlessly into the family room & kitchen. An expansive center bar-island, high-end Miele appliances & tall windows w/ample light capture one's attention upon entering the kitchen. Overlooking the south-facing backyard & right off the kitchen, the large deck provides for convenient outdoor living & entertaining. The primary en suite bedroom w/ walk-in closet is on the upper level. This private level includes a nursery/office & an additional 215 sqft* storage room. The backyard is low maintenance & continues onto a large covered patio w/expansion potential. The garage offers parking for 2 cars. An additional 234 sqft* finished room works well as a dedicated office, gym or workshop. The house is also equipped with a solar energy system. Centrally situated, the location offers convenience access to much of the city
Confidential Remarks: Supra lockbox - pease contact me for access/alarm instructions. Please visit 2811BushSt.com for more details. Ground level bonus room was not included in the stated square footage. Living area square footage number is from previous MLS listing. Buyer to verify Parking, square footage numbers, and any expansion potential using qualified professionals to their satisfaction. Escrow w/ First American Title, Kelley Kish. www.2811BushSt.com

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to 3122 Clay, a dreamy 2-level condominium in the heart of one of San Francisco's most beloved neighborhoods, Pacific Heights. This home boasts the incredibly rare attribute for a condominium: 4 bedrooms and 3 baths. Coupled with a generous layout including a living room, dining room and two family rooms, the lifestyle on this tree lined block is fantastic. The Victorian architecture allows for 10 foot ceilings, oak floors, wainscoting and bay windows. The proverbial cherry on top is the walkout, exclusive use garden which is award winning and published in magazines. Within walking distance you will find yourself at the Presidio Library, Alta Plaza Park, Fillmore St, Sacramento St and Laurel Village. Come and experience it for yourself.
Confidential Remarks: A+ Location. 2-level. 4BDs. Exclusive use garden. This place has it all! Please call Max Armour 415.290.6058 for showings. Thank you!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located on one of Pacific Heights' most charming blocks, this lovely home draws you in with its exquisite Victorian exterior and reveals a wonderfully livable floor plan once inside. The gracious entry leads to an elegant living room with carved wood mantel and tall windows that let in gorgeous natural light. A formal dining room (with handsome built-in cabinets), an en suite bedroom, a primary suite with spacious dressing room/office and kitchen with eat-in area complete this level. Down an internal spiral staircase you enter a cozy family room complete with corner wood burning fireplace, wet-bar, en suite bedroom with bath and access to enlarged side-by-side garage. The sweetly landscaped backyard is accessible from the downstairs family room or from a west-facing deck off the kitchen. Bonus features include an elevator from the garage to the main living level, hardwood floors throughout and exquisite original Victorian details. Updated systems, a new roof and significant foundation work when the garage was widened make this a very special and solid home. Steps to chic Sacramento Street, a block to transit and five minutes to Laurel Village or the Presidio make this a unique San Francisco property.
Confidential Remarks: www.1905Baker.com Easy to show by appointment. Floor plan measurement shows 2065sf. Buyers are encouraged to measure to their satisfaction. **Offers welcome beginning anytime after Noon on Friday, April 19. Please use San Francisco purchase agreement.**
Directions to Property: On Baker between Clay and Sacramento Streets.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Fabulous opportunity to own a spacious 3BD/2BA condominium in Pacific Heights. Situated on a tree-lined block and offering approx. 1931 sq ft of living space (per graphic artist), this full-floor flat features an open floor plan, generously proportioned rooms, and stylish updates. Highlights include: gracious foyer, formal living room w/gas fireplace, gourmet kitchen with center island, sleek white appliances and Fireclay handmade tile backsplash, large dining room with plenty of room to entertain, and primary suite with fireplace, walk-in closet and designer tiled bath. Additional features include in-unit W/D, private storage, rarely available 2-car side-by-side parking, and upgraded electrical, plumbing and foundation in 2012. There are special touches throughout, from Elfa systems in all closets and custom window shades to Serena & Lily light fixtures. Boutique building in an A+ location, steps to Alta Plaza Park and close to a wonderful array of quaint cafes, fine dining and upscale shops along Fillmore and Sacramento Streets. *Photos primarily from 2021 before recent improvements.
Confidential Remarks: The property sold as a Coming Soon Listing.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: The Victorian facade of this classic Pacific Heights home shows beautiful architectural detail, and the front garden beckons you to the sheltered porch. Upon entering, the living room and adjacent dining room make a stunning impression, with unusually high ceilings, wainscoting, molding, and a marble fireplace. Flooded with sunshine from bay windows, the corner location provides abundant natural light from three sides. The first bedroom, at the front, could also serve as an office/nursery. The primary bedroom, also on this level, has an en-suite bath. Flowing seamlessly from these gracious rooms into the more contemporary spaces, there is a modern, open living space towards the back with eat-in kitchen, family room, full bath, and atrium. Accessed from the family room, the deck provides lofty outdoor space. The entire level begs to be used for gracious entertaining. The spacious lower level includes a second family room, two bedrooms, a large bath, laundry, and storage. With a private entrance, this is an ideal guest suite. With a premier location in a coveted neighborhood, it's minutes from the amenities of Fillmore and Sacramento. Rated a Walker's Paradise'', public transit is a mere block away, while the 2-car garage gives added convenience.
Confidential Remarks: Offers to be reviewed Wednesday July 17th at 10:00am. disclosures are at: https://app.disclosures.io/link/1902-Baker-Street-6y093k0y

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Located in the highly sought-after Divisadero Corridor with all of its fantastic restaurants and shopping, this modern and newly updated 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom residence resides within a renovated Edwardian building comprising only 7 units, blending luxury and functionality. Its airy layout boasts soaring ceilings and a sun-drenched living space flowing into a reimagined, newly renovated kitchen featuring new stainless steel appliances, a designer backsplash, and modern quartz countertops. Two generously sized bedrooms and a newly renovated spa-inspired bathroom enhance the contemporary allure. Hardwood floors, radiant heating, an in-unit laundry area, and a great floor plan with bedrooms separated from the living area add to the convenience. Additionally, enjoy the communal backyard deck, ideal for hosting gatherings, and a large private storage room on the ground level. This home's prime location offers easy access to numerous amenities, public transit, shops, restaurants, and more! Walk Score 98! **Seller to pay for offsite parking through June 2025. Offsite parking is two blocks away with 24/7 access. Buyers have the choice to secure parking at their own cost starting July 2025.**
Confidential Remarks: Please contact Russell Pofsky for private showings 415-317-2177. Pre-escrow is opened with Mark Adams at WFG Title. Please submit offers via email (not Homelight) to Team@IlanaMinkoff.com and cc Russell@vanguardsf.com and write offers on SFAR RPA and include the TIC purchase addendum with offer. Please make sure front page, if not all of disclosure package, is signed and EMD is in escrow within 24 hours. One commercial unit plus 6 residential units, Redwood has loaned on building seamlessly. An undivided 14.2857% Tenancy in Common Interest. Square footage from TIC agreement: Neither the seller nor the broker has verified the square footage. Seller to pay for offsite parking through June 2025. Offsite parking is two blocks away with 24/7 access. The current parking lease price is $302.50; agents make no guarantee pricing will not increase. Buyers will determine if they want to secure the leased parking starting July 2025 at their own cost.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This gracious Presidio Heights home has been cherished by the same family for several decades. A remarkable property providing an exquisite canvas ready for a new vision, 3300 Jackson offers approximately 5130 square feet of living space (per graphic artist) with 4 bedrooms, 4 full bathrooms, and 2 half baths. Abundant windows and corner location cast natural light throughout the home. A remarkable property with wonderful architectural details and grand-scale including a pent room with view of the Golden Gate Bridge and roof deck provide endless possibilities to create the ideal space. Located on a coveted block in The City's best neighborhood and steps away from the Presidio Wall, this is the place to be.
Confidential Remarks: Showing by appointment only, including agent previews. Property has a substantial amount of deferred maintenance needing attention. No interior pics available at this time, floor plan in attached docs. Email travis.hale@sothebys.realty or call Travis at 415-722-6150. Pre escrow with Heather Shiffer First American Title. Please allow 72 hours for seller response.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Top floor, 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo unit with roof deck, one car parking, 3 large storage rooms (one has wine storage racks), in-unit wine closet and more in the heart of the Pacific Heights neighborhood. Panoramic views await one story up the common staircase to the roof deck featuring views of the SF skyline, TransAmerica Building, Mt. Diablo, etc. The updated chef's kitchen is sure to delight with granite countertops, dual wall-mounted ovens, stainless/ gas appliances, a generous pantry, recess lighting, dishwasher, and an elegant glass door wine storage located adjacent to the kitchen. The bathrooms and kitchen have been recently updated. Both the dining room and primary bedroom feature cozy wood burning fireplaces. Voluminous ceiling heights and period details like crown moldings and coved ceilings throughout the property. Separate in-unit laundry room. Skylight in the living room. Poured in place cement foundation with large beams/ fasteners visible in the garage.
Confidential Remarks: Please do not disturb occupants.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: 3002 Clay is properly located in one of San Francisco's most beloved and sought after neighborhoods, Pacific Heights. This location allows for easy access to some of the City's best: Fillmore St, Alta Plaza Park, Laurel Village and the Presidio. The property has the classic Victorian architecture with all the modern elements. The 12 foot ceilings allow for a grand scale and tremendous natural light. The barrel front bay windows frame the tree lined street, Twin Peaks and Sutro tower in the distance. The living room has a bar area, fireplace, build-ins and an office/den. The gracious sized eat-in kitchen has beautiful outlooks, island, double ovens and four burner gas cooktop will grill. The primary bedroom has a large walk-in closet, build-ins, sitting area and ensuite doubled sink bathroom. There are two more bedrooms, one large bath with a separate tub and shower. In-unit laundry, 1 car side-by-side garage parking round out this feel good home.
Confidential Remarks: NEW LISTING. 2,039 square feet per graphic artist. 2,000 per the public record. Buyer to verify to their satisfaction. Open Thursday, June 6th, 5-7PM. Do not use ShowingTime. Please call Max Armour at 415-290-6058 to schedule a private appointment.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to this elegant and updated full-floor Pacific Heights condominium! This home seamlessly blends modern updates with charming original details. Upon entering, you'll be greeted by a spacious formal entry that leads to the chic living room. The living room features charming window seats, pocket doors, and a grand wood-burning fireplace. The formal dining room with wine rack and decorative fireplace. The eat-in kitchen has been beautifully updated with marble countertops, a large island, and top-of-the-line appliances (including a Viking Range and Subzero fridge). There's also a stylish bar with a wine refrigerator, perfect for entertaining. With three bedrooms, there's plenty of space for family, guests, or a home office. 2 bedrooms share a hall bath with marble walk-in shower. The primary en-suite bedroom has a large walk-in closet and designer bath with separate shower and tub + double sinks. This home is completed with in-unit laundry, hardwood floors throughout, and a shared garage + storage. Enjoy the best of Pacific Heights with easy access to shopping and dining on Fillmore and Sacramento Streets and close proximity to the Presidio.
Confidential Remarks: Escrow open with Kelley Kish @ First American. HOA dues are paid quarterly - approximately $187./month.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Felicia Duncan - 510-508-1779 - Welcome to 2609 Pine Street, a timeless gem nestled in the heart of San Francisco's coveted Lower Pacific Heights neighborhood. This exquisite 3 bed, 1 bath home showcases the captivating original Victorian architecture that the city is renowned for. Built in 1900, this residence effortlessly merges classic charm with comfort. This home presents a fantastic opportunity for contractors, as it offers a wealth of potential for improvement despite some deferred maintenance. Beyond its inviting façade lies an ideal location, offering unparalleled convenience to some of San Francisco's most iconic destinations. Embrace the tranquility of the nearby Presidio or indulge in the vibrant energy of the Marina District. Immerse yourself in culture at Fort Mason or savor the rich heritage of Japantown, all within effortless reach. 2609 Pine Street places you at the crossroads of culture, nature, and urban living.
Confidential Remarks: For questions, please contact Felicia Duncan: 510-508-1779 | felicia@onyxwealthrealty.com Disclosures Link: https://app.disclosures.io/link/2609-Pine-Street-zss6zzrc

This exquisite 3 bed, 1 bath home showcases the captivating original Victorian architecture that the city is renowned for. Built in 1900, this residence effortlessly merges classic charm with comfort. This home presents a fantastic opportunity for contractors, as it offers a wealth of potential for improvement despite some deferred maintenance. Beyond its inviting faade lies an ideal location, offering unparalleled convenience to some of San Francisco's most iconic destinations. Embrace the tranquility of the nearby Presidio or indulge in the vibrant energy of the Marina District. Immerse yourself in culture at Fort Mason or savor the rich heritage of Japantown, all within effortless reach. 2609 Pine Street places you at the crossroads of culture, nature, and urban living.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Live life with a touch of refinement at 1715 Lyon, a striking contemporary home in chic Lower Pacific Heights. Thoughtfully updated throughout, this 3 bedroom / 2 bathroom condo is the perfect oasis in the heart of the city. Its social spaces meet under an impressive vaulted ceiling and share a built-in Sonos audio system. The extensively updated kitchen, with stainless-steel appliances including a 6-burner Wolf gas range and abundant counter and storage space, flows seamlessly into living and dining areas. 3 bedrooms include a primary suite with spa-like bathroom and 2 others with window seats, including 1 with an office nook. A laundry closet and updated second bathroom with soaking tub complete this level. Follow steps down from the entertaining space to the shared backyard. Enjoy cooking with the grill or relaxing by the fire pit. A+ location - enjoy tranquility at home while remaining near exciting restaurants, shops, and entertainment. Walker's Paradise and Excellent Transit per Walkscore.com. Sellers have pre-paid for a leased parking spot through November 2024.
Confidential Remarks: Sellers have approved plans to add skylights, though the unit is certainly bright enough. Easy to show, please contact Jennifer for an appointment! Disclosures still in process, but will be ready soon. Extensive renovations since the last sale.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Boldness and elegance collide with compelling, timeless design and thoughtful updates throughout this Pacific Heights home, steps from the vibrant Fillmore corridor and facing beautiful Alta Plaza Park. A chic and sophisticated residence fully remodeled top to bottom with all new systems, the home is ideally configured for contemporary living yet still maintains its classic scale and volume through the 11.5' ceilings on the main level. Stepping into the dramatic entryway, one is drawn to the subtle elegance of the home, with private and tranquil outlooks onto Alta Plaza Park. The naturally-lit living room is both elegant and chic flowing into the dining room with fireplace. The fully equipped kitchen opens to a walk-out deck enjoying the southern light and overlooking the lush garden below. Top level, the primary suite gazes over the iconic Alta Plaza Park and features a crisp and spacious primary bath and two walk-in closets. Two additional bedrooms on this level share a sunny, south-facing bath. The garden level hosts a media room (or guest BR) with a full bath, office, and walk-out access to the garden. 2-car tandem parking laundry. Heart of Pacific Heights with all the best of Fillmore Street, best area schools, and the Park steps away.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Enjoy expansive space in this full floor, 7 room, majestic Edwardian Condominium. Spacious eat-in kitchen with new refrigerator and stove. Stainless steel appliances and solid wood cabinets and built in wall-unit for ample storage functionality. The washer and dryer are in the kitchen area. The formal dining room off kitchen has original built-in cabinets, a grand brick fireplace with a gas heating unit and elegant beamed ceilings. The living room with original tile work around the fireplace with a gas heating insert, is spacious with coved ceilings opens to the second parlor with built-ins for office or entertainment area. This home has 3 full sized bedrooms and the flexible floorplan could easily function as a 4 bedroom home. There are 2 full baths, one of the baths is split with a separate water closet allowing ultimate privacy when needed. A large storage area exclusive to this unit is in the basement. Great central location between Sutter and Bush, 1 block off Divisadero for easy commutes. Leased pkg available within a block.
Confidential Remarks: This is a 3 unit Condominium building, all utilities are metered separately. Insurance is paid when due, there are no HOA monthly dues. Leased parking is available within a block at the garage off Sutter. Offers reviewed as received.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Pacific Heights top floor corner unit radiates natural light overlooking Alta Plaza Park. This light-filled one bedroom condo with large floor plan features both a spacious living and formal dining room. The formal dining room includes a versatile pocket door that could be used for additional storage or an office. The formal living room includes a built-in window bench parallel to additional built-in wall cabinets. The galley kitchen was stylishly remodeled with quartz counter tops and custom white full extension cabinets with blumotion soft close. Generous sized bedroom with an attached cosmetically updated bathroom creates additional convenience. To the right of the bathroom there is an additional bonus space for an office or yoga. Recent updates to hardwood floors, paint, fixtures and the previously updated kitchen and bath. If the views, location, in-unit laundry and updates weren't enough the one car automatic garage door parking make this an irresistible living space. Walk Score 97 out 100.
Confidential Remarks: Please see disclosures here - https://app.disclosures.io/link/2802-Clay-Street-6gy2xozb | Offer date is on Monday 12/19 at 2 pm. Pre escrow opened with DOMA MarryAnn Bunnell

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This bright Victorian jewel condo lives like a single family home. It is a one bedroom, one bath with great flexible living space. The home has charming period detail including high ceilings, picture windows, hardwood floors, a decorative fireplace, and crown molding. The living area in front is bright with a large built-in, decorative fireplace and bay windows overlooking greenery. The farm-inspired kitchen has newer appliances, handsome cabinetry, and a clean backsplash. Flexible space off the kitchen is perfect as a dining area and/or a casual hangout or office space. There is a large private deck off the kitchen. The bedroom is central with lots of privacy and pocket doors. The bathroom is spa-like with a generous walk-in shower and door to the deck. A large unwarranted space below that could be used as an office or exercise area and a laundry space with hook-ups. Storage space below with its own front and rear door access. It is central and minutes away from shops, restaurants and activities of both Sacramento and Divisadero Street corridors in Pacific Heights. The JCCC community center gym is close by. The MUNI transit is easily accessible with the 1 California a block away to downtown and the 24 Divisadero a couple blocks with a route north and south. No HOA du
Confidential Remarks: Very cute house like structure. Currently no HOA fee. It is a condo but operates like two single family homes. Each home has their own insurance. No HOA policy. Please review newly reinstated CCR's. Disclosures IO Link: h8dtxa9f We will be accepting offers at 2pm on Thursday, July 18,2024. Please allow a 24 hour window for review. The successor trustees need to review and come to a agreed upon offer. They live in separate states. We received a total of 10 offers on the property.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Warren Lei - Agt: 510-610-3051 - Beautiful architectural details abound in this East-Lake Victorian gem located in Pacific Heights! This gracious home built circa 1900 features light-filled and spacious rooms, bay windows, fireplaces, hardwood floors, a fantastic indoor/outdoor layout ideal for entertaining and everyday living, private backyard, updated systems and oversized garage/bonus area. Convenient to parks, shops and amenities of Pacific Heights and public transit and walkscore.com - 98!
Confidential Remarks: For comp purposes only - private sale

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: In the esteemed Pacific Heights neighborhood, this elegant condo combines classic charm w/ modern amenities. Natural light floods in through large South-facing windows, highlighting the hardwood floors that flow seamlessly through the living, kitchen, and dining areas. The living room is adorned with a gas fireplace & enclosed built-in bookcases. Gourmet kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, island, stone countertops, gas range, wine refrigerator, a Shaws farmhouse sink, breakfast area, & pantry closet, perfect for culinary enthusiasts and entertainers alike. Sophisticated formal dining room is decorated with coffered ceiling, a cast-iron fireplace, built-in buffet, & full Edwardian style wall paneling. Primary bedroom is a serene retreat that opens to a sprawling private deck. Beautifully appointed en-suite bathroom, connected by a walk-in closet, creates a spa-like ambiance with marble tiles, frameless glass shower w/ rain shower heads, double vanity, & radiant floor heating. 2 add'l bedrooms, a plus room with separate entrance, & laundry room offer add'l comfort and flexibility, ideal for guest or home office. Conveniently located near Presidio, Alta Plaza Park, and shops/dining offering the perfect blend of location & conveniences.
Confidential Remarks: Contact Veronica for disclosures. Offer date Wednesday, June 19th at 11:00 AM. Square footage has not been verified by Seller or LA, Buyer to satisfy themselves. OH: 6/8, 6/9, & 6/16 from 2-4PM.
Directions to Property: Between Presidio Ave and Lyon St

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome home to luxurious 2238 Divisadero Street. Just a short stroll to Alta Plaza Park, The Presidio & vibrant Fillmore Street this stunning Pacific Heights property has it all! Masterfully redesigned w/the finest bespoke finishes, this grand property blends an ideal layout with modern amenities & exquisite period details. The gracious foyer invites you to the light-filled living room w/custom built-ins & gas fireplace that flows to the large formal dining room w/designer lighting. The chef's kitchen boasts professional grade appliances, Quartz counters, breakfast bar & plentiful cabinetry & pantry. The elegant hallway leads past two beautifully appointed bedrooms & a chic 2nd full bathroom, to the magnificent primary suite with spa-like bathroom (w/cozy heated floors), spacious sitting room, walk-in closet & sunny office. Stairs lead down to the serene rear deck surrounded by mature landscaping -- perfect for relaxing, BBQing & al fresco dining. A HUGE storage room & home gym (426 square feet total not included in square footage) on the ground level are accessed from stairs off the laundry porch adjacent to the kitchen. Gorgeous hardwood floors, designer lighting & window treatments, dual-paned windows, large parking space and much more...
Confidential Remarks: Property is now in contract. Seller requests no more showings. More info, aerial video, etc at www.2238Divisadero.com Please call or text Ron at 415-279-4579 with questions. Dining room light fixture and round mirror in 2nd bathroom not included in sale.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Enjoy modern luxury living in this impeccably remodeled top-floor condo nestled in the heart of Pacific Heights. Meticulously renovated in 2014, this residence is flooded in natural light w/ 11' ceilings. The spacious living room features a living wall, original leaded glass windows, a cozy wood-burning fireplace and adjoining dining area. Entertain in the chef's kitchen, featuring custom floor-to-ceiling cabinets, Carrera marble countertops with a 9' waterfall island, stainless Thermador appliances + a wine fridge, all flowing into the adjacent family room with its own gas fireplace. Retreat to the serene master suite, offering picturesque treetop views, a generous walk-in closet, and an ensuite marble bath with dual sinks and a luxurious walk-in shower. Additional highlights include 2 more bedrooms, a hall bath + a dedicated laundry room. Enjoy a view rooftop deck, a shared garden, and the comfort of modern amenities such as an A/C system and central air. There are also 2 storage rooms + a 1 car garage with internal access. Enjoy the best of Pacific Heights with easy walking to the Lyon Street Steps, Sacramento & Fillmore Streets + Laurel Village.
Confidential Remarks: Escrow open with Kelley Kish @ First American.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Live the ultimate San Francisco lifestyle in this elegant Queen Anne Victorian, full-floor flat in desirable Pac Heights. Just a stone's throw from Alta Plaza and the chic boutiques and hot restaurants of Fillmore and Sacramento, this home seamlessly blends historical charm with modern luxury. The 3-bedroom, 2.5-bath residence features a fully renovated kitchen, two luxurious bathrooms (including one brand new bathroom with a steam shower!), and a designer wet bar off the dining room for enhanced entertaining. Soaring ceilings and period details are complemented by custom window treatments and striking chandeliers throughout. Additional recent updates include: a bonus office space off the living area, a walk-in closet in the primary bedroom, additional closet build-outs in the 3rd bedroom, and a new kitchen pantry. Need more reasons to fall in love? How about the deeded parking space, the shared BBQ area / dog run, and the prime location on a slow street near Alta Plaza Park. This condo ensures a serene, distinguished, and elevated SF living experience!
Confidential Remarks: The sellers made wonderful, high-end improvements to the property since purchasing, including adding a full bath with steam shower, new wet bar and wine fridge, custom window treatments from Shade Store, new office nook, stunning new chandeliers throughout, walk in closet in primary, other closet build outs in 3rd bedroom, etc. No expense was spared, but family plans changed and they had to move sooner than expected. Great opportunity to buy a turn-key, luxury condo with unbeatable SF charm! Call Blakely Hull for showings and more intel: 415-410-3455. Diclosures: https://app.disclosures.io/link/2971-Clay-Street-mxwbu89o Property Website: http://www.pacheightscharmer.com/

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Just high enough above one of the Clay Slow Street's most exclusive blocks to see above the trees, sun streams through the south facing bay windows into 3114 Clay #5. Views to both the east and west invite you to enjoy the large windows. This top floor home features Edwardian details, such as gracious period light fixtures, coved ceilings, pocket doors and a claw-foot tub. A remodeled kitchen with hip green granite counters and freshly painted cabinets awaits your creative cookery while friends await in the adjacent dining area or spacious living room. The living room features built in book cases, a charming decorative fireplace and pocket doors that can provide privacy if it's used as an extra space for guests. The large front bedroom has a built in window seat where you can enjoy a book or the view and two spacious closets. The 2nd bedroom accommodates a full sized bed, or can be used as an office. Many closets and built ins make gracious living easy. The large bathroom, with charming hexagonal tile floor has been refreshed with a new lighting and vanity top. It also has a full height linen press/storage cabinet & shower over soaking tub. The building features a welcoming lobby and shared laundry room and also completed the required seismic retrofitting in 2020.
Confidential Remarks: This property represents a 17.557% interest in the building. To show privately, please email team@rosdail.com and/or call or text 415-237-1038 to follow up. PLEASE call/text Jennifer for questions about the property/interest, etc. Disclosures available at www.LivingPacificHeights.com

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This gorgeous Lower Pac Heights Victorian-era property offers two levels of living that mix classic and modern styles with high ceilings, period moldings, wood floors, an open kitchen, and custom window treatments. The primary floor has two bedrooms; one is a primary suite with a gorgeous walk-through hallway and large closets to each side leading to an updated full bath with shower over tub and double vanity. There's also a convenient half bathroom at the rear of the home. The open floor plan joins the dining room, a built-in bar, and the Chef's Kitchen, which has a full suite of brand-name appliances. Just off the kitchen is a private deck designed for outdoor gatherings, quiet times, dinner al fresco, or movie nights with friends and family. Especially exciting is the one bedroom/1 bath on the lower level with a separate entrance, which could be perfect as a short-term rental, au pair unit, guest's retreat, or a work-from-home office. There is a one-car, independent parking spot with generous storage. Informally run HOA, shared expenses are split and paid on demand. Great shopping on Sacramento St and public transit is just two blocks away.
Confidential Remarks: New price! More value for the money. Come see this fab location and unit. Flat block, big garage. Great home with guest quarters or revenue potential. Lower bed/bath suite has been used in the past as a licensed short-term rental, though no guarantees are made for future use as such. Information from 3rd parties is deemed to be reliable, but has not and will not be verified by listing broker or agent. Buyers are encouraged to do their own due diligence. DR light fixture is NOT included in the sale, and a replacement will not be provided. Custom window treatments ARE included in the sale. Your offer is welcome anytime. Disclosures available via D-IO button in MLS, or at this link: https://app.disclosures.io/link/1726-Lyon-Street-0co8z8ws
